title: The Power of Data Visualization Beyond Tableau and Power BI
excerpt: If you think data visualization begins and ends with Tableau or Power BI, you’re already behind. From Plotly to Looker to DIY dashboards, the new frontier is about agility, not brand names.

title: Turning Data into Decisions: What It Really Means
excerpt: Most companies don’t fail because they lack data, they fail because they don’t know how to turn it into real decisions. Dashboards don’t drive strategy, people do.
